channel.title: On Fire! 🔥 Mix By D*Bligity
channel.description:
On Fire! Mix By D*Bligity ~~>> https://m.soundcloud.com/danbligity/on-fire-mix
My first, and hopefully not last, Auxy/GB hybrid engineering project. Yes, there are many ways/processes to accomplish a favorable outcome; but it was a pain in the ..!
Anyways, first jam I’ve posted here. TIA, If ya give it a listen, hope ya like it!~
